items.sentence: Tom slammed the door with such force that the glass in the window frames rattled.
Three students made short speeches and introduced themselves and their countries.
The ages of the two children put together was equivalent to that of their father.
After going to three different stores, Tom finally found what he was looking for.
Tom quit his job as a sanitation worker to become a prescription drug wholesaler.
If you stay with the company until the end of the year, you will receive a bonus.
The man that I talked to on the bus said that he'd been to Australia three times.
To the man who only has a hammer in the toolkit, every problem looks like a nail.
I spend about half my time trying to convince Tom to do what he's supposed to do.
Tom couldn't open the door because something was blocking it from the other side.
